column5: Weather is good. Only fished 2 spots (enough). The second spot is actually my perch and bass zone, because I wanna get some meat for dinner. To surprise me, this time we caught most bass around there. Caught alot of perch, plus some nice bass (released). After 2 pm, bass suddently stop biting. Guess we relased too much, lol. Called a day.  Landed about 20 smallies/2 anglers. The biggest one is probably over 5 pd, a few 3~4 pounders, and the rest are 2~2.5 pd.  Keep some good size perch (11~13 inches) for dinner. Great opener.
those perch look almost as big as the bass. Well done.
Great opener!  I still haven't found the 5+ pound bass yet...hoping to change that this weekend!
those fish are HUGE!  (hold em closer next time  ). But seriously, nice fish and looks like a great time!
